subject: Missing Item from Recent Order #SSN3636
description_text:
Dear Customer Service,



I hope you are well.

I am writing regarding my recent order. I ordered two items, but I have only received one of them.



Could you please check the status of the missing item and let me know when I can expect to receive it?





Thank you in advance for your help.

I look forward to your reply.



Carlos

conversations.body_text: Hi Carlos Czc,    We apologize for the inconvenience caused. Our German warehouse experienced a temporary stock shortage and has only recently completed restocking, which delayed your shipment. Here is your tracking link. Delivery is expected around the 6th.  https://www.dhl.de/en/privatkunden/pakete-empfangen/verfolgen.html?piececode=CE326634009DE
